SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: UPDATE b_contact SET Update_Time=NOW() <%=,Company=@@Company@@%> <%=,Contacts=@@Contacts@@%> <%=,Phone=@@Phone@@%> <%=,Email=@@Email@@%> <%=,Matter=@@Matter@@%> <%=,Wechat=@@Wechat@@%> <%=,WhatsApp=@@WhatsApp@@%> <%=,Contact_Status=@@Contact_Status@@%> <%=,Processing_Result=@@Processing_Result@@%> <%=,Update_UserId=@@Update_UserId@@%> <%=,Update_User=@@Update_User@@%> WHERE Contact_ID=@@Contact_ID@@;

SELECT Contact_ID,Company,Contacts,Phone,Email,Matter,Wechat,WhatsApp,Contact_Status,Processing_Result,Create_Time,Create_UserId,Create_User,Update_Time,Update_UserId,Update_User FROM b_contact WHERE 1=1 <%= AND Contact_ID=@@Contact_ID@@%> <%= AND Company=@@Company@@%> <%= AND Contacts=@@Contacts@@%> <%= AND Phone=@@Phone@@%> <%= AND Email=@@Email@@%> <%= AND Matter=@@Matter@@%> <%= AND Wechat=@@Wechat@@%> <%= AND WhatsApp=@@WhatsApp@@%> <%= AND Contact_Status=@@Contact_Status@@%> <%= AND Processing_Result=@@Processing_Result@@%> ORDER BY Contact_Status,Contact_ID <R%= LIMIT @@StartIndex@@, @@SelectCount@@ %R> ; SELECT COUNT(0) AS row_count FROM b_contact WHERE 1=1 <%= AND Contact_ID=@@Contact_ID@@%> <%= AND Company=@@Company@@%> <%= AND Contacts=@@Contacts@@%> <%= AND Phone=@@Phone@@%> <%= AND Email=@@Email@@%> <%= AND Matter=@@Matter@@%> <%= AND Wechat=@@Wechat@@%> <%= AND WhatsApp=@@WhatsApp@@%> <%= AND Contact_Status=@@Contact_Status@@%> <%= AND Processing_Result=@@Processing_Result@@%> ;
